data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 9,656 believers in the county of Tiruppur to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary: On average, 71 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 877,800 people living in Tiruppur through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Viswakarma Vilkurup people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Viswakarma Vilkurup people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Viswakarma Vilkurup people is yours.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
